      • exportManifest

        public void exportManifest(java.lang.String filepath)
        Overwrites an existing .csv file. Exports a manifest based on current store stock levels. Loops through the store inventory and finds all items below reorder points. It then adds adds these items to either hotStock or coldStock hashmaps depending on whether the item is temperature controlled or not. A manifest is then created, and the items in the hashmaps are optimally sorted into trucks, which are then added to the manifest. Finally, the contents of each truck are looped through and added exported to the .csv file.
        Parameters:
        filepath - to overwrite existing file

      • generateManifest

        public void generateManifest(java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> coldStockMap,
                             java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> hotStockMap,
                             Manifest manifest)
        Generate a manifest given hashmaps of hot and cold items, and a manifest
        Parameters:
        coldStockMap - - a hashmap of all the cold items and their reorder amounts
        hotStockMap - - a hashmap of all the ordinary items and their reorder amounts
        manifest - - the manifest to add the trucks to

      • createTrucksFromStock

        public void createTrucksFromStock(java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> coldStockMap,
                                  java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> hotStockMap,
                                  int coldQuantity,
                                  int hotQuantity,
                                  Manifest manifest)
        Create successive stock objects of correct size and optimal distribution and add them to trucks, which are then added to the manifests
        Parameters:
        coldStockMap - - a hashmap of all the cold items and their reorder amounts
        hotStockMap - - a hashmap of all the ordinary items and their reorder amounts
        coldQuantity - - the total number of cold items
        hotQuantity - - the total number of hot items
        manifest - - the manifest to add the trucks to

      • organiseCargo

        public int organiseCargo(java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> stockMap,
                         Stock stock,
                         int n)
        Organises the given items into truck sized stocks by modifying the given stock, then returns the number of items added, so that they can removed from the total count in the parent function. If the items have temperature control, the coldest items are added to a truck first so that they arent spread across multiple trucks, which would increase manifest cost.
        Parameters:
        stockMap - - hashmap containing items and quantities
        stock - - the stock to add the items to
        n - - the max number of items in the stock
        Returns:
        int - quantity
